reviewText: The third installment of the "Experiments in Terror" series continues to deliver images so horrific, you won't believe your eyes. This compilation of short films creates a constant disturbing, creepy mood to make the audience happy they are only peering into the lives of others and not experiencing the terror for themselves. If you're craving a different way make your heart pound, turn off the lights, snuggle up with a friend, and turn on "Experiments in Terror 3." It will take viewers on an uncontrollable ride of nightmares they never thought could exist.
